Sid.description: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the End User resource which are derived End User Types.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the End User resource.
**attributes**: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the End Users resource which are listed in the End User Types.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sid**: The unique string created by Twilio to identify the End User resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the End User resource.
